name: AIG Europe Ltd
bossPosition: Executive Director, EMEA General Counsel, EMEA LEGAL
membership: ABI (Association of British Insurers) and other relevant national insurance associations eg. GDV.
goal: AIG Europe Limited is a part of AIG, a leading international insurance organisation serving customers in more than 100 countries and jurisdictions. AIG companies serve commercial, institutional and individual customers through one of the most extensive worldwide property-casualty networks of any insurer.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: All insurance files eg. Insurance Distribution Directive, General Data Protection Regulation, Solvency II, Insurance Block Exemption Regulation etc.
